issue.title: [CF 666] Better dogtags for items
issue.body:
Perhaps I've just failed to find the correct option, but it seems to me that it's not possible to display the number of remaining charges of an item on the TMW icon (healthstone) or the number of remaining items (health potion).


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #666 | Raw

comments.body:
Well, http://www.wowace.com/addons/libdogtag-items-3-0/ is a thing that exists. Perhaps I should implement it into TMW.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Wait a minute. First of all, http://www.wowace.com/addons/libdogtag-items-3-0/ hasn't been updated since 2009, and its only a single tag anyway, so I'm not going to use it.

However, you can just enable the Show Stacks option for an item cooldown icon and it should output this information to the [Stacks] tag. If you need it on a non-item cooldown icon, then you can just reference an item cooldown icon from another icon's tags (using the [Stacks(group=1, icon=2)] format.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Marked ticket as declined since this is actually already possible in TellMeWhen. Let me know if this doesn't work for you, though.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
